author: milos88
content:
As a follow to yesterday's discussion, I created:
- PR https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/issues/405 - specifies that random gossip be used for ephemeral content
  - I moved already existing specification of random gossip
- Issue https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/issues/404 - highlighted some issues with the current random gossip spec and proposed alternatives

It would be great if people could look at those, provide their opinion, propose alternatives, etc
